Product.Title: Original Blend
Product.Description: The unique mix of 100% Arabica beans delivers the smooth, delicious flavor that's made Dunkin’ Donuts® coffee famous. Also available in whole bean.

Product.Title: Dunkin’ Dark
Product.Description: Dunkin’ Dark® coffee is carefully roasted using 100% Arabica beans. Try Dunkin’ Dark® coffee for a rich coffee experience.
Product.SubHeading: A Darker Roast for a More Full-Bodied Flavor

Product.Title: Dunkin’ Decaf
Product.Description: Want decaf without skimping on taste? Dunkin’ Decaf® coffee, made with 100% Arabica beans, has all the taste of Dunkin’ Original Blend.

Product.Title: Dunkin’ Turbo
Product.Description: This rich, smooth, medium roast coffee has an extra boost of delicious Dunkin’ Donuts® flavor to kick-start your day
Product.SubHeading: Better Call Dibs on the Big Mug

Product.Title: French Vanilla
Product.Description: Enjoy the taste of Dunkin’ Donuts® French Vanilla coffee. The flavor is perfect for those craving a flavorful coffee experience. Savor the French vanilla splendor with each sip. Your coffee mug never had it so good.

Product.Title: Hazelnut
Product.Description: You'll go nuts for the velvety taste of Dunkin’ Donuts® Hazelnut coffee. Warm and nutty, it's a nice change of pace from your usual coffee routine. Spread the sweet aroma of roasted hazelnuts with every pot.

Product.Title: Cinnamon Spice
Product.Description: Dunkin’ Donuts® Cinnamon Spice coffee is a comfort to your senses. This flavorful coffee is perfect to brew at home on a crisp morning, cozy night or anytime you want to fill your home with its enticing aroma.
